title: Best Kindle: Which is the best ereader for you- Kindle Vs Paperwhite Vs Voyage
description:
If you want a device to read your ebooks on, the market isn't particularly crowded right now. Amazon has taken over the ereader game with its innovative Kindle products but which has the best screen for you out of the Kindle, paperwhite and voyage? After all the most important feature of an ereader is how easy it is to read!

http://www.techradar.com/news/portable-devices/best-ereaders-2014-which-should-you-buy--1267343
